body.directions: Listen to the audio; then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Who would you address using the title in the audio?
body.correct: Job well done! 先生xiānsheng means “Mr.” and is used to address adult men.
body.incorrect: Very close. Pay attention to both characters in the word and what the combination means.

body.quiz: Which of the following does not have the same social function as the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 朋友 péngyǒu
options: Audio for 小姐 xiǎojiě
Audio for 女士 nǚshì
Audio for 先生 xiāngsheng
body.correct: Outstanding! The words 太太 tàitai (Mrs.). 小姐 xiǎojiě (Miss), 女士 nǚshì (Ms.), and 先生 xiānsheng (Mr.) are all titles used to formally address someone, while 朋友 péngyǒu (friend) is a noun and cannot be used as a title.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Pay attention that in the word, the same syllable is said twice. Think about which word we have learned that has that feature.
